updated_cases.title: check with multiple policy (dlp, non-dlp)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create multiple policy for same app with different profiles(dlp, non-dlp)
2. Upload/download different files
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. If its a dlp file it should match dlp policy or else match non-dlp policy

updated_cases.title: Verify that by default justification timeout set to 1800 and suppress interval set to 60 seconds
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that by default justification timeout set to 1800 and suppress interval set to 60 seconds
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Ensure that the config is set up as per the test requirement
2. Create a User Justification policy
3. Access a page which will hit the created policy
4. Access the page again and validate that the cache timer values are honored
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Default value should set to 
DEFAULT_SUPPRESS_INTERVAL 60
JUSTIFICATION_TIMEOUT 1800

updated_cases.title: Verify the user justification end to flow with the default values
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the euser justification end to flow with the default values
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Ensure that the config is set up as per the test requirement
2. Create a User Justification policy
3. Access a page which will hit the created policy
4. Access the page again and validate that the cache timer values are honored
updated_cases.custom_expected: Cache timeout should be 1800 and pop-up should reapper in the cache interval
